channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Asserting a Personal Role in Warner Bros. Battle, Trump Seeks to Expand His Powers Again
item.description: The move comes as the Supreme Court also appears poised to put antitrust enforcement by the Federal Trade Commission under his control.

item.description: We look at climate solutions across the country.

item.title: Khmer Rouge-Era Land Mines Have a Big Role in Thailand-Cambodia Conflict
